tool_description: Computes total shipping weight including items, packaging materials, and protective padding.

item_weights.description: Weight of each item in pounds

packaging_weight.description: Weight of packaging materials in pounds

error_messages: Invalid weight values: All weights must be positive numbers greater than 0
Weight limit exceeded: Total weight cannot exceed 150 pounds per package
Packaging weight error: packaging_weight must be between 0.1 and 10 pounds
usage: Provide item_weights array and optionally specify packaging_weight to calculate total shipping weight.

billable_weight.description: Weight used for billing (greater of actual or dimensional weight)

weight_category.description: Shipping weight category (light, standard, heavy, oversized)
